Title: Relates to emergency and non-emergency transportation of medical assistance recipients
Summary: Relates to emergency and non-emergency transportation of medical assistance recipients; provides that such transportation may not be assigned, delegated or subcontracted to third parties.
LawCode: Add ยง3005-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to emergency and non-emergency transportation of medical assistance recipients
